Steps.Message: Update at 21:20 - Thanks for your continued patience this evening. Our specialist teams have now arrived on site, and will shortly be starting excavations so further tests and repairs to our cabling can be carried out. Based on how much work there may be to complete, we're now estimating power will be on between 01:00 and 02:00. We're sorry to advise you a delay, but we'll keep you up to date with our progress. as it comes in. If you have any concerns, our team are always here on 08003163105.

We became aware of a power cut at 18:50. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 21:20 - Thanks for your continued patience this evening. Our specialist teams have now arrived on site, and will shortly be starting excavations so further tests and repairs to our cabling can be carried out. Based on how much work there may be to complete, we're now estimating power will be on between 01:00 and 02:00. We're sorry to advise you a delay, but we'll keep you up to date with our progress. as it comes in. If you have any concerns, our team are always here on 08003163105.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
